title: Desert OverWatch
description: A 1990 deployment to Iraq, in the build-up to the first Gulf War turns deadly. Old rivalry surfaces amid the danger, tension and stress of life behind enemy lines.  Sergeant James Regan wants nothing more than to be at home with his family. After nearly two decades of putting his life on the line fighting for Queen and country, he has decided it's time to quit the Royal Marines, he just has to make it home.  Was it passion, jealousy or fear that turned a Royal Marine into a calculating, cold-blooded murderer?
author: Thomas J. Eyre
